name: Glass Apple
description:
I found this base recipe on ELR, modified it only a small bit, so no credit goes to me on this.  After a 2 day steep it is really good.

Fuji Apple-  The main note in this juice, has a wet apple juice taste on the inhale
Koolada-  Might be too strong for some, but I like it, gives it the ice sensation.
Peach Juicy-  Reminds me of a fresh peach on the exhale.
Peach White- Balances the peach flavor.
Strawberry Ripe-  To be honest I can't taste it, I think it is helping with the sweetness or assisting in joining the apple and peach, either it works.
author: photohap

reviews.text: This recipe is delicious. Tad to much koolada for me but I can change that. Really yummy thanks
Made this for about a dozen times. Very tasteful recipe!
